description:
Day 1 starts with an interview to find out what Nerine has to offer as a trainee. She is a very submissive, but I’m concerned with her pain threshold. I decide to explore this to find out how much she is capable of handling. She is determined to prove herself and to become a better submissive.

She is faced with one of her biggest fears and proves that she is worthy of being called a trainee. She will be back for future assessment, as I feel she has a lot to offer.
title: Testing Nerine Mechanique
